mapper.sql: id, username, password, name, user_status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_user
id,
username,
password,
name,
user_status,
created_by,
created_time,
updated_by,
updated_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sys_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT username, name, user_status as userStatus FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT username,password FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username};
